requirements: Develop a mobile application aimed at the company's customers
The application must have availability on IOS and Android.
You must help affiliates to view and edit data related to their account.
project_overview: While I was working at the company AFP Reservas I was in charge of developing the client application, this development was very important for the company because currently the country's AFPs (Pension Fund Administrators) did not have mobile applications that would provide information on its affiliates and they had to go to the customer service offices or call the institution for any questions or procedures.
the_challenge: Developing an app from scratch is already challenging enough, but the background knowledge with previous app development made the job more enjoyable. It was quite a long development to meet all user requests because the application had to have many utilities and options for an attractive launch for the company's affiliates.
the_solution: There was a team of 5 people for the development and implementation of it.
After the corresponding analysis of the user requirements, creation of operation diagrams and design of the different views, the development began using the following technologies:

results.title: Efficiency
results.desc: The customer service and call center departments reduced the number of queries.

results.title: Customer Satisfaction
results.desc: Delivered a development with all the requested features and more.

results.title: Overall Cost
results.desc: Since it was an internal development and not by contract.

results.title: Store Rating
results.desc: The acceptance of the application by the affiliates was exceptional.

result_note: I am very proud of the result of it, which at the time of writing this post has more than 50 thousand downloads and a score of 4.5 out of 5 in each of the stores.
